name: EyeQuant Inspect
description:
Is the button visible enough? Is my design too cluttered? Is the content in the right place?


Instantly see how users will respond to your designs - as early as a high fidelity wireframe or prototype - so you know what works and what doesn’t, before you go live. 


EyeQuant is an essential product for designers to create more successful digital experiences and maximise design performance. 


Features 


  • Attention Heatmaps 
  • Clarity scores 
  • Excitingness scores 
  • Regions of Interest 


How does the EyeQuant plugin work?


  1. Select the Figma frame you want to analyse
  2. Go to Plugins > EyeQuant Inspect > Analyse 
  3. View the results


The Tech 


EyeQuant’s technology fuses AI and neuroscience to simulate a 200-person study in seconds, giving you instant, actionable results. 


It is the result of more than a decade of institutional academic research by leading neuro and data scientists at CalTech and the University of Osnabrück.


See more here —> https://www.eyequant.com/how/
